Please don't have Wale back on. This whole interview annoyed me.......

I don't think interviews are his strong suit because he does come off a little standoff-ish. It comes off as if he's being an asshole. But I think he uses the sarcasm to deflect, from being uncomfortable... 

Also it would help to know the artists discography/ catalog before calling them up for a 2 hour interview.

Drunk or not you can't ramble through 2 hrs  with a person who has some level of intelligence🤷🏾‍♀️
